Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

I have only done a small amount of blender work (making Old Asteroids that have since been made obsolete by ARM) and so don't think I have the requisite skills to pull this off, but I would love to see Soyuz and Proton Style Launch clamps. See the picture below for what I am talking about.

Anyone up for the challenge. I would think that some of you have the skills to whip up something pretty fast and I would be willing to do whatever i needed to (cfgs or whatever) to get it rolling. Feel free to post on here or PM me if you are interested.

![4451408_orig.jpg](http://www.spaceflight101.com/uploads/6/4/0/6/6406961/4451408_orig.jpg)
raidernick has several of these in Soviet Probes.

I literally just downloaded those to see if you were right. I'm afraid you aren't. There are no launch clamps in Radiernick's mods, either of them. In fact, these clamps would make a perfect addition to his and Bobcat's old Soyuz and proton as well as the OLDD ones.

> 
> raidernick has several of these in Soviet Probes.

The rockets are in that pack, but not the clamps! I agree with the OP; we need these!
Requests go in [General Add-on Affairs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/19). There's a tag specially for that.

Since this is more of a request for help creating an add-on, I'm moving this over to General Add-on Affairs. Feel free to create a new thread over in Add-on Development when you have some work to show us. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Requests go in [General Add-on Affairs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/19). There's a tag specially for that.

There's also a button to let the moderators know about posts. 

> ![black-white-warning-1-th.png](http://www.clker.com/cliparts/3/p/9/L/T/X/black-white-warning-1-th.png)
